body: this task will get someone's attention soon

@maurezen please go ahead, it's your task now, keep [this](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/17/how-xdsd-is-different.html) in mind, and don't hesitate to ask any technical questions you may have; The budget of this task is **30 mins**. This is exactly how much time will be compensated, when the task is completed. Read about our [Definition of Done](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/15/definition-of-done.html)
@darkled thank you for the ticket reported, I topped your account for 15 mins, transaction `49978575`

issue.title: Multiple use of the same hardcoded string

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body: In the process of investigating  #963 I found that failsafe.github.key property is accessed via System.getProperty call with the same hardcoded string literal. This doesn't look like a good design.

body: @dmarkov the scopes needed are gists, user:email, public_repo and read:public_key, right? Just checking so I didn't miss anything.
@dmarkov, ping. It's been 48 hours since I asked you a question, could you please react somehow?
@maurezen you should ask @darkled, he is the reporter of the ticket, see http://www.yegor256.com/2014/11/24/principles-of-bug-tracking.html#1.-keep-it-one-on-one
@yegor256 if I knew which scopes are needed I wouldn't create this issue. What should we do then?
@yegor256 the reporter is incapable of answering this question. Is research within the scope of this issue?
@yegor256 @darkled never mind, created a pull request here #974
